# import/no-default-export

<div class="rule-meta">
</div>

### What it does

Forbid a module to have a default exports. This help your editor to provide better auto imports.

### Examples

```javascript
// bad1.js

// There is a default export.
export const foo = 'foo';
const bar = 'bar';
export default 'bar';
```

```javascript
// bad2.js

// There is a default export.
const foo = 'foo';
export { foo as default }
```
